languages.text: "В бою мое сердце веселят боевые гимны сестер и предсмертные крики нечестивцев. А в редкие моменты отдыха — лучи рассвета и запах росы на тех мирах, где их можно застать".

"In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."
languages.original_text: "В бою мое сердце веселят боевые гимны сестер и предсмертные крики нечестивцев. А в редкие моменты отдыха — лучи рассвета и запах росы на тех мирах, где их можно застать".

traits.locale_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in my sisters' battle hymns and the death cries of the unrighteous. And in my occasional moments of rest, it cherishes the rays of dawn and the smell of dew on worlds where one can find them."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."

traits.locale_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Au combat, mon cœur se réjouit en entendant les hymnes martiaux de mes sœurs et les cris d'agonie des infidèles. Dans mes rares moments de repos, je chéris les premières lueurs de l'aube et l'odeur de la rosée là où l'on peut trouver de telles choses. »
languages.original_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."

traits.locale_text: « Au combat, mon cœur se réjouit en entendant les hymnes martiaux de mes sœurs et les cris d'agonie des infidèles. Dans mes rares moments de repos, je chéris les premières lueurs de l'aube et l'odeur de la rosée là où l'on peut trouver de telles choses. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «En combate, mi corazón encuentra la dicha en los himnos de mis hermanas y en los últimos gritos de los injustos. Cuando dispongo de un momento para descansar, que es algo inusual, disfruto de las primeras luces del amanecer y del olor del rocío en el suelo allá donde puedo encontrarlos».
languages.original_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."

traits.locale_text: «En combate, mi corazón encuentra la dicha en los himnos de mis hermanas y en los últimos gritos de los injustos. Cuando dispongo de un momento para descansar, que es algo inusual, disfruto de las primeras luces del amanecer y del olor del rocío en el suelo allá donde puedo encontrarlos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “当战斗到来时，我和我的姐妹们会唱着颂歌加入战斗，我的灵魂会在不义之人临死的惨叫中找到快乐。而当我难得有时间休息时，我会寻找黎明的第一缕阳光，轻嗅露水甜美的味道，珍惜能看到这一切的地方。”
languages.original_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."

traits.locale_text: “当战斗到来时，我和我的姐妹们会唱着颂歌加入战斗，我的灵魂会在不义之人临死的惨叫中找到快乐。而当我难得有时间休息时，我会寻找黎明的第一缕阳光，轻嗅露水甜美的味道，珍惜能看到这一切的地方。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「戦闘中、私の心は姉妹たちの戦闘賛歌に、そして不義を行う者たちの死の叫びに喜びを見出す。貴重な休息のとき、私は夜明けの光と、露の匂いを大切にする。
languages.original_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."

traits.locale_text: 「戦闘中、私の心は姉妹たちの戦闘賛歌に、そして不義を行う者たちの死の叫びに喜びを見出す。貴重な休息のとき、私は夜明けの光と、露の匂いを大切にする。
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Im Kampf findet mein Herz Freude in den Kampfhymnen meiner Schwestern und den Todesschreien der Unrechtschaffenen. Wenn ich einmal einen seltenen Augenblick der Ruhe habe, genieße ich an Orten, an denen sie zu finden sind, die ersten Strahlen der Morgendämmerung und den Geruch des Taus auf dem Boden."
languages.original_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."

traits.locale_text: "Im Kampf findet mein Herz Freude in den Kampfhymnen meiner Schwestern und den Todesschreien der Unrechtschaffenen. Wenn ich einmal einen seltenen Augenblick der Ruhe habe, genieße ich an Orten, an denen sie zu finden sind, die ersten Strahlen der Morgendämmerung und den Geruch des Taus auf dem Boden."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Savaşta kalbim, kardeşlerimin savaş ilahileriyle ve dinsizlerin ölüm feryatlarıyla huşu bulur. Dinlenme lüksüne sahip olduğum nadir zamanlarda ise şafağın ilk ışıklarının ve topraktaki çiyin kokusunun tadını çıkarırım. Bulunduğum yerde böyle şeyler varsa tabii."
languages.original_text: "In combat, my heart finds joy in the battle hymns of my sisters and in the death cries of the unrighteous. When I have a rare moment to rest, I cherish the first rays of dawn and the smell of dew on the ground in places where such things can be found."
